information.name: quickbooks-online
information.description: This plugin exports payments and invoices to QuickBooks Online
information.author: Ubiquiti Networks, Inc.

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID obtained from your Intuit developer account.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret obtained from your Intuit developer account.

configuration.label: Account type (Development|Production)
configuration.description: If you use “Development Keys”, use “Development” here. Otherwise, use “Production”

configuration.label: Income account ID
configuration.description: Income Account ID from QuickBooks. Enter 0 here if you are using "Income account name" below

configuration.label: Income account name
configuration.description: Income Account name from QuickBooks. This will only be used if "Income account number" above is 0

configuration.label: Item Name Format String
configuration.description: Optional format string to generate QB item names derived from UCRM item type. Can be typically set to something like "YourWisp %s" or "UCRM %s" to end up with items named "UCRM service", "UCRM product" etc..

configuration.label: Date to start for Invoice export
Date to start for Credit Memo export
Date to start for Payment export
Link payment method to QB account
configuration.description: If you'd like to set the "Deposit to" field in QB based on payment type, you can set that here. Enter 1 payment type per line like this (without the double quotes): "Cash=The Cash account". If you want to enter more than 1 payment type, put the next payment type on the next line

configuration.label: Logging Level
configuration.description: Leave empty for default (i.e. regular logging level). To get more details in log, enter "debug" (without the double quotes)
